title: Perms banned
body: Is there any way to appeal for a ban lift? Or at least ask for a review?

replies.body: If it's for toxicity, Riot will never repeal bans unless you are falsely accused.

Your case was already solved in your other thread.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/pNAchvIb-ive-been-banned-by-trolls-plz-get-this-discussion-some-attention

> [{quoted}](name=Void Nargacuga,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=pNAchvIb,comment-id=000000000001,timestamp=2016-10-06T18:59:39.485+0000)
>
> If you have been punished before with a total of 35 games of restricted chat, and a 14 week ban before receiving this permanent ban... Then the only person you can blame is yourself since you never improved your own behavior.

That's why I made another, no one gave me an answer, all they said was UR TOXIC
I already admitted what I thought was wrong, I asked if there's any way to reveiw my case so the trolls can be punished too

If you have already reported the trolls, your job is done. That's it. Your report will flag the trolls in order to get them punished a bit sooner, and it will take some time. 

According to this thread:

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/EuFdhkAE-this-was-a-while-ago-i-still-dont-get-it

...your last punishment which was a 14 days suspension was already considered your 2nd chance. You will not get any appeal for this account anymore as you still did not reformed. I suggest you start focusing on your smurf instead.
if they got reported it will be looked at no reason to make another post even if they get punished your punishment will stay because it was for your behaviour
Even if they did punish them, you'll never know as it is against Riot's privacy policy to tell you.
You basicly can't also nameshaming on the Boards is not allowed
Send in a support ticket is the only thing i can think of. although dont expect much Riot doesn't unban people often.

You can just click the bar on the top right of the page to go to your previous thread, and then simply copy-paste the chat logs.

When I saw the chat logs
http://l.wigflip.com/l2KEODob/roflbot.jpg

> [{quoted}](name=4789,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=huVnRIJl,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2016-10-07T13:00:30.541+0000)
>
> I said I'm puttin then up on at 3 school -_-

Get off your phone during class and pay attention or you'll become a 30 year old manchild who takes care of his emotionally disturbed mother and brain dissected brother with no job prospects and president of the Virgin hermit for life club. Like me.
My parents disowned me, I love at my friends cuz my parents hate me. I'm in ap classes with a's so I think I'm fine
Please tell me you were this teemo in my last match. If so I hope you grow tastebuds in your asshole.
I see no reason to make such an accusation. Since there is no proof that the OP is the person that you linked.
Fair point, removed the linked person. Accusing someone of being a teemo support player is just disrespectful.

You can submit a support ticket, but they will not remove a ban unless it was issued in error.

If you want the community can review your logs if you post them and tell you what got you punished.
Kk, I'll post the logs at 3:00 you guys tell me
